scripts.dev: npm run dev:prepare && nuxi dev playground
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxi prepare playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --patch --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --minor --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --major --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:alpha: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --premajor alpha --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:beta: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --premajor beta --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:rc: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --premajor rc --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.pre-release:alpha: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --prerelease alpha --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.pre-release:beta: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --prerelease beta --push && npm publish --access public
scripts.pre-release:rc: npm run lint && npm run prepack && changelogen --release --prerelease rc --push && npm publish --access public
